snippet: “In Pursuit of a Vision,” a survey of the 200-year-old American Antiquarian Society’s collections, shows how a new country started thinking of its past and present.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews exhibition In Pursuit of a Vision, featuring artifacts from the collection of the American Antiquarian Society, at the Grolier Club.
lead_paragraph: “In Pursuit of a Vision,” a survey of the 200-year-old American Antiquarian Society’s collections, shows how a new country started thinking of its past and present.

headline.seo: ‘In Pursuit of a Vision,’ at the Grolier Club
headline.main: Two Centuries of Creating U.S. History
headline.print_headline: Two Centuries Of Creating U.S. History
